DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate whether newly-approved everolimus-eluting stent inferior sirolimus-eluting stent term rate target-lesion revascularization 1-year death myocardial infarction 3-year stent implantation real world clinical practice .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Evaluation Sirolimus-eluting Versus Everolimus-eluting Stent Trial
DOC.detailed_description: Sirolimus-eluting stent widely use coronary drug-eluting stent Japan . Everolimus-eluting stent new coronary drug-eluting stent , go approve first quarter 2010 Japanese Ministry Health , Labor Welfare . It recently report everolimus-eluting stent low rate target-lesion revascularization stent thrombosis 1 year compare paclitaxel-eluting stent . However , trial result compare everolimus-eluting stent sirolimus-eluting stent largely unknown . The purpose study evaluate whether newly-approved everolimus-eluting stent inferior sirolimus-eluting stent term rate target-lesion revascularization 1-year death myocardial infarction 3-year stent implantation real world clinical practice . The design study all-comer design enrol patient schedule percutaneous coronary intervention use drug-eluting stent without exclusion criterion .
DOC.criteria: Patients schedule percutaneous coronary intervention use drugeluting stent
